resources.string: Enter a title and press the search button
NoSpoilerAI helps you catch up on your favorite shows and movies without major spoilers by providing AI-generated summaries and timelines for specific episode ranges.
This product uses the OMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by OMDb.
This product uses the Perplexity API for AI-generated summaries.
How do I search for a show or movie?
Enter the title in the search bar on the home screen and tap the search button. Select your desired show or movie from the results.
How do I select an episode range?
After selecting a show, choose the season and then set your desired episode range using the sliders. For movies with multiple parts, simply select the range of parts you want to catch up on.
What information will the summary contain?

The summary provides a spoiler-free overview of main events and important plot developments, without revealing major twists or endings. It\'s designed to help you catch up while preserving the viewing experience.
What\'s the difference between Summary and Timeline?

The Summary provides a narrative overview, while the Timeline shows key events in chronological order. The Timeline is useful for understanding the sequence of events, while the Summary gives you a more flowing narrative.
